title: New: Hani Zahra – Along Those Lines
content:
Along Those Lines is the debut album from Brooklyn band, Hani Zahra.

With only one previous EP, the band’s new material shows growth and I personally find it amazing. Their electronic/synth sounds compliment fully to the low-soothing vocals creating a peaceful environment. Tracks like Daytrip or Prizefighter are examples of how the band is starting to emerge into something great.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d13
